entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
